game.name: InOut
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 각 레벨이 겉보기보다 더 많은 것을 담고 있는 미니멀 퍼즐 플랫폼 게임입니다. 새로운 구역을 발견하려면 시각을 바꿔보세요. 숨겨진 비밀을 밝혀내기 위해 세계를 탐험하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A minimalist puzzle platformer where each level is more than they seem. Change your perspective on levels to discover new areas. Explore the world to unearth its hidden secrets.
